trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de acionamento que altera a velocidade de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SetStoryboardSpeedRatio action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar uma ação de SetStoryboardSpeedRatio com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>para controlar o rácio de velocidade de um guião gráfico principal interativamente.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of SetStoryboardSpeedRatio to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>propriedade SetStoryboardSpeedRatio para especificar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>velocidade de animação como um rácio de velocidade de animação antigo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>para 2, faça duplo a velocidade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animações e se definir um valor de 0,5, reduzir a velocidade em 50 por cento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto afeta o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>em qualquer altura após a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>começa.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se colocar em pausa o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>e utilizar SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, quando a retomar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, utiliza o rácio de velocidade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>tem de referenciar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Colocar em pausa, retomar, parar, caso contrário, o controlo um guião gráfico principal interativamente para conseguir fazer pausa, retomar ou caso contrário, controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar a consultar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não foi especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> velocidade de animação como um rácio de velocidade de animação antigo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para especificar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>velocidade de animação como um rácio de velocidade de animação antigo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the SpeedRatio to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se definir o SpeedRatio para 2, duplicar a velocidade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animações e se definir um valor de 0,5, reduzir a velocidade em 50 por cento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>
O rácio de velocidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.
